system.description: Handed to you by the Talons, the MesmerTrance dampener supposedly stops the highly advanced and aggressive “MesmerTrance” virus from affecting your mech. As a side effect, it also provides limited protection against other, less sophisticated attacks on your mech’s systems.
system.effect: 1/Scene as a reaction when you are targeted by a tech attack, you may give that attack +1 Difficulty. Additionally, you gain Immunity to the MesmerTrance environmental hazard.
